name: Connect-4
tagline: Just another Java-based Connect 4 application. Made for an A.I. course in University of Rome "La Sapienza" with Prof. Toni Mancini
body:
Developed by:
Alessio Mecca - alessio.mecca@hotmail.it
Samuele Pontremoli - samuele.pontremoli@gmail.com
Marianna Progan√≤ - marianna.p91@live.com

This application should work with all the machines supporting Java 1.6 or following versions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
